name: Schürzenjäger Open Air
description:
The Schürzenjäger Open Air 2017
An Alpine Rock festival!

Program:

Wednesday, 2nd August 2017:
Welcomeparty at the village square Finkenberg

Friday, 4th August 2017:
Soundcheckparty

Saturday, 5th August 2017:
Big open air festival with the Schürzenjäger and their musical guests.

Inlet: 1 p.m. | Start: 2.00 p.m.

Tickets:
Pre-sale: € 38, - | cash desk: € 40, -
Children's tickets € 11, - (up to and including 11 years) *
Youth cards € 20, - (from 12 up to and including 18 years) *
* Tickets are available in sufficient quantity, upon presentation of a valid ID card, at the cash desk.

Tickets:
Tourismusverband Mayrhofen-Hippach
ticket@mayrhofen.at or 05285 6760
